comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Charles Sebastian "Red" Dooin (1879-1952), catcher, Philadelphia Phillies for most of his career, but this might have been taken in 1915-16, when he was finishing his career with the New York Giants: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Red_Dooin

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: pennylrichardsca: Thanks for the additional information! We'll add more about Dooin to the source data and then reload the description here in Flickr.
